issue_obverse_figure_description_s: Seal of a harp with thirteen strings with motto MAJORA MINORIBUS CONSONANT (The large in harmony with the small).
issue_obverse_legend_s: CONTINENTAL CURRENCY. | The United Colonies | EIGHT DOLLARS | EIGHT DOLLARS. THIS Bill entitles the Bearer to receive EIGHT Spanish milled  DOLLARS, or the Value thereof in Gold or Silver, according to a Resolution of CON-GRESS, passed at Phi-ladelphia, July 22, 1776.
issue_reverse_figure_description_s: Nature print of henebit and two buttercup leaves.
issue_reverse_legend_s: EIGHT DOLLARS. | PHILADELPHIA: PRINTED BY HALL & SELLERS. 1776.
